title: user authentication login and registration
description: Test the user authentication endpoints for login and registration to ensure secure access for both users and administrators with correct role differentiation.

title: admin panel user product category order shop management
description: Verify the admin panel APIs for creating, reading, updating, and deleting users, products, categories, orders, and shops to ensure full administrative control.

title: user profile and order management
description: Test user management endpoints for viewing and updating profiles, as well as accessing order history and interactions.

title: product catalog browsing and filtering
description: Validate product catalog APIs to ensure users can browse products by category, view detailed product information, and see product images correctly.

title: order creation and tracking
description: Test order management endpoints for creating new orders, tracking order status, and managing order items with updates reflected in user profiles.

title: shop management functionality
description: Verify shop management APIs to handle multiple shops registration, updates, and retrieval within the platform.

title: cms content management
description: Test CMS content management endpoints to ensure administrators can create, update, and display static content pages correctly.

title: permissions and roles access control
description: Validate permissions and roles management APIs to enforce role-based access control and authorization policies across the platform.
